tier_2_material.property_description: gold and silver ornaments, mobile handsets

tier_3_contextual.incident_location: Suyog bungalow, Basveshwar Housing Society, Mali Vasti, Sangli

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Amol Vishwas Ovhal vs. The State of Maharashtra

residual_details.additional_facts: The robbers were armed with weapons like sickles. They assaulted the victims and tied them up before fleeing.
